definitions: 十分[じゅうぶん] (n, vs) enough, sufficient, plenty, adequate, satisfactory,sufficiently, fully, thoroughly, well, perfectly,division into ten
１０分[じっぷん] (n) 10 minutes
english: No, I can handle him! There's no way he can avoid my punch.
japanese: いえ、私１人で十分よ！私のパンチをよけられるはずがないわ

definitions: 態と[わざと] (adv) on purpose

japanese: なぜ？わざと、よけなかった……

definitions: 氷河[ひょうが] (n) glacier

definitions: 放り込む[ほうりこむ] (v5m, vt) to throw into, to toss into

japanese: どこかの家にほうりこんでおいて！

definitions: 閉鎖[へいさ] (n, vs) closing, closure, shutdown, lockout
english: This village is now under martial law!

definitions: ぶっ飛ばす[ぶっとばす] (v5s, vt) to knock (someone) to their feet, to knock down,to send flying, to strike, to fling, to fire,to drive away (one's sorrows, worries, etc.), to dispel,to drive at terrific speed, to barrel along
english: (Kick his butt)
japanese: （こいつをぶっとばす）

definitions: 避ける[さける] (v1) to avoid (physical contact with),to avoid (situation),to ward off, to avert
裂ける[さける] (v1, vi) to split, to tear, to burst, to be separated, to be divided

definitions: 下り坂[くだりざか] (n) descent, downhill, decline, waning

japanese: ダメダメ！！この先は、すごい下り坂なんだ

japanese: よし、ヒマだからスノーボードの乗り方を教えてやろうか？

japanese: それより、向こうの坂を下るにはスノーボードでもなければ無理だぜ。乗り方を教えてやろうか？

definitions: 下がる[さがる] (v5r, vi) to come down, to go down, to fall, to drop, to sink, to get lower,to hang, to dangle,to move back, to step back, to withdraw, to retire,to deteriorate, to fall off, to be downgraded,to get closer to the present day,to go south

下る[くだる] (v5r, vi) to descend, to go down, to come down,to be handed down (of an order, judgment, etc.),to pass (of time),to surrender, to capitulate,to be less than, to be inferior to,to have the runs, to have diarrhea,to pass (in stool), to be discharged from the body,to depreciate oneself, to be humble

japanese: それより、向こうの坂を下るにはスノーボードでもなければ無理だぜ。乗り方を教えてやろうか？

japanese: とっても、まぶしい光がクレーターのバリアを突き破ったんだ！いったい、何が起こっているんだ！？

japanese: おっ、ちゃっかりしてるなあ！もう地図をはがしてるんだな

契丹[きったん] (n) Khitan people, Khitai, Kitan, Kidan

definitions: バーテン (n) bartender

japanese: バーテン

definitions: プライベート (n) private,privacy

definitions: 読み[よみ] (n) reading

japanese: イファルナさん星読みとは、どういうことなのですか？

definitions: 治す[なおす] (aux-v) to cure, to heal,to fix, to correct, to repair,to do over again,to replace, to put back as it was,to convert (into a different state), to transform

japanese: 古代種、いやセトラは星を治す特別な力を持っているのですか？

definitions: 雪解け[ゆきどけ] (n, vs) snow thaw, thawing
english: Hmm, even here so close to the North Cave, the snow never melts. Is that because the Planet's energy is gathered here to heal its injury?
japanese: ふむ、北の大空洞に近いこの地に雪どけの時期がこないのは星の傷にエネルギーが集中しているからなのか

definitions: 時期[じき] (n) time, season, period, phase, stage
english: Hmm, even here so close to the North Cave, the snow never melts. Is that because the Planet's energy is gathered here to heal its injury?
japanese: ふむ、北の大空洞に近いこの地に雪どけの時期がこないのは星の傷にエネルギーが集中しているからなのか

english: 2000 years ago, our ancestors, the Cetra, heard the cries of the Planet.
japanese: およそ２０００年前わたしたちセトラの祖先はこの星の悲鳴を聞いたそうです

definitions: 祖先[そせん] (n) ancestor

japanese: およそ２０００年前わたしたちセトラの祖先はこの星の悲鳴を聞いたそうです

definitions: 表現[ひょうげん] (n, vs) expression, presentation,representation, notation
english: …I can't explain it very well, but it's like having a conversation with the Planet…
japanese: ……うまく表現できませんけど星と対話することなのです……

definitions: 対話[たいわ] (n, vs, adj-no) dialogue, discussion, conversation, interaction
english: …I can't explain it very well, but it's like having a conversation with the Planet…
japanese: ……うまく表現できませんけど星と対話することなのです……

definitions: 絶やす[たやす] (v5s, vt) to exterminate, to eradicate, to wipe out, to put an end to,to let (fire) go out, to let die (e.g. flowers), to run out of
english: The Cetra tried desperately to cultivate the land so as not to diminish the needed energy…
japanese: セトラたちは必要とされるエネルギーを絶やさぬために必死で土地を育てようとしたのですが……

definitions: 必死[ひっし] (n) frantic, frenetic, desperate,inevitable death,brinkmate (inevitable checkmate)
english: The Cetra tried desperately to cultivate the land so as not to diminish the needed energy…
japanese: セトラたちは必要とされるエネルギーを絶やさぬために必死で土地を育てようとしたのですが……

definitions: 費やす[ついやす] (v5s, vt) to spend, to expend, to consume,to waste, to squander, to throw away,to devote
english: Yes, the energy that was needed to heal the Planet withered away the land…then the Planet…
japanese: ええ、傷の回復に費やすエネルギーは急速に土地を枯れさせ…そして星は…

definitions: 急速[きゅうそく] (adj-na, n) rapid (e.g. progress)

japanese: ええ、傷の回復に費やすエネルギーは急速に土地を枯れさせ…そして星は…

進める[すすめる] (v1, vt) to advance, to move forward, to put (a clock, watch) forward,to carry forward (plans, work, etc.), to proceed with, to make progress in, to further, to advance, to hasten, to speed up,to raise, to elevate, to promote, to develop, to stimulate (e.g. one's appetite)
english: The Planet tried to persuade the Cetra to leave the Knowlespole, but…
japanese: 星はセトラにノルズポルから離れるようにすすめたそうです…でも

definitions: 旅立ち[たびだち] (n, vs) setting off (on a trip)
english: I'm all right… When the Cetra…were preparing to part with the land they loved…
japanese: だいじょうぶです…セトラたちが…長年親しんだ土地から旅立ちの準備をしていたとき……

definitions: ウイルス (adj-no) virus,viral
english: The Cetra were attacked by the virus and went mad… transforming into monsters.
japanese: ウィルスに侵されたセトラたちは心を失い……そしてモンスターと化しました

japanese: ウィルスに侵されたセトラたちは心を失い……そしてモンスターと化しました

japanese: ウィルスに侵されたセトラたちは心を失い……そしてモンスターと化しました

definitions: 兄[あに] (n) elder brother, older brother
兄[けい] (pn) elder brother,pronoun or suffix used in reference to an older brother figure, Mister, Mr
兄[にい] (n) used after the name of someone who is an older brother figure,used with various honorifics to mean (older) brother
兄[このかみ] (n) eldest son,older brother, older sister,older person,head of a clan, head of a region,skilled craftsman
english: That's when it appeared!
japanese: その時、そのものは現れたのです！その姿は、亡き母の…亡き兄のものでした。それぞれに過去の幻影を見せるのです

definitions: 欺く[あざむく] (v5k, vt) to deceive, to delude, to trick, to fool,to be as ... as ... (e.g. "as bright as day", "as beautiful as a rose")
english: It looked like…our…our dead mothers …and our dead brothers. Showing us specters of their past.
japanese: その者は親しげな顔でセトラたちに近づき…あざむき…そして……ウィルスを…ウィルスを与えたのです

definitions: 部族[ぶぞく] (n, adj-no) tribe, clan, house

japanese: その者は、ノルズポルと同じように別のセトラの部族に近づき………そしてまた…ウィルスを……

japanese: では、ウェポンとは星の意志が生みだした兵器ということですか？

definitions: 少数[しょうすう] (n, adj-no) minority, few

japanese: 少数の生き残ったセトラたちがジェノバに討ち勝ち、そして封印したのです

japanese: 少数の生き残ったセトラたちがジェノバに討ち勝ち、そして封印したのです

definitions: 誤解[ごかい] (n, vs) misunderstanding

definitions: 我が家[わがや] (exp, n) one's house, one's home, one's family

屈す[くっす] (vs-c, vi) to yield, to give in, to be daunted, to shrink,to bend (knee, etc.),to subdue, to overpower,to feel down

japanese: クスクス……ええ、そうね

definitions: 疾うに[とうに] (adv) long ago, a long time ago, already

japanese: いやぁ、骨をおりました。あなたたちが、ここにいることぐらいとうにわかってたんですよ

definitions: 年間[ねんかん] (n-suf) (period of) a year,during an era

japanese: でもね……２年間待ちました。私は新しいサンプルがほしかったんですよ……クックックッ

definitions: 我が子[わがこ] (exp, n) one's own child, one's own children

definitions: ずれる (v1, vi) to slide, to slip off, to get dislocated, to be out of alignment, to get dislodged, to deviate, to shift (position), to be out of sync., to be slightly off, to be off-point

definitions: 広げる[ひろげる] (v1, vt) to spread, to extend, to expand, to enlarge, to widen, to broaden,to unfold, to open, to unroll, to unwrap,to scatter about, to spread around,to make flourish, to cause to prosper
english: Then, let's look at the map. Just push [SWITCH].
japanese: ほな、地図でも見よか。ええからはよひろげぇな。□ボタンや

definitions: 見てくれ[みてくれ] (n) appearance, outward show
english: We should check it on the map. Press the [SWITCH].
japanese: 地図で確認すべきだな。□ボタンで見てくれ

definitions: 凍える[こごえる] (v1, vi) to freeze (of one's body), to be frozen, to become numb (with cold), to be chilled
english: It sure is cold. We'll freeze if we stay here any longer.
japanese: それにしても、ものすごい寒さだあまり長くここにいるとこごえてしまうな

definitions: 凍る[こおる] (v5r, vi) to freeze, to be frozen over, to congeal
english: This is the only place not frozen.
japanese: ここだけ凍っていないな

definitions: 近寄る[ちかよる] (v5r, vi) to approach, to draw near
english: And don't come back again.
japanese: もう近寄らないでください

definitions: 触れる[ふれる] (v1, vt) to touch, to feel,to experience, to come in contact with, to perceive,to touch on (a subject), to allude to, to refer to, to mention,to be in conflict with, to violate (law, copyright, etc.), to infringe,to proclaim, to make known, to spread (e.g. a rumour)
english: Yeeew… You got a lot of nerve trying to touch me with the same dirty hands that touched that filthy hot spring!
japanese: ああ……よくもあの汚い温泉にさわった手でこの私に触れたな

definitions: 殊に[ことに] (adv) especially, particularly, unusually, above all,additionally
english: Why this?
japanese: なんてことに……

definitions: 突っ走る[つっぱしる] (v5r, vi) to run swiftly, to dash, to rush, to race
english: We're outta here!
japanese: つっぱしる

definitions: 住み着く[すみつく] (v5k, vi) to settle (in a place), to settle down
english: Oh, I'm sorry, my name is Holzoff. I've lived here for 20 years.
japanese: おっと失礼！　わたしの名は、ホルゾフ。この地に住みついて、もう２０年だ

definitions: 山男[やまおとこ] (n) giant, woodsman, alpinist
english: Do you mind hearing some stories from a lonely climber?
japanese: よければ、向こうの部屋でさびしい山男の独り言を聞いてくれんか？

definitions: 独り言[ひとりごと] (n) soliloquy, monologue, speaking to oneself
english: Do you mind hearing some stories from a lonely climber?
japanese: よければ、向こうの部屋でさびしい山男の独り言を聞いてくれんか？

definitions: 立ち話[たちばなし] (n) talking while standing, standing around talking
english: Why don't we go to the next room and sit down.
japanese: 立ち話もなんだから向こうの部屋に行こう

definitions: 体温[たいおん] (n) temperature, body temperature (human, animal)
english: …And you have to keep your body temperature normal. Don't forget these 2 things.
japanese: 下がった体温を回復させること。これらを忘れてはいけないぞ

definitions: 虎列剌[コレラ] (n) cholera
これ等[これら] (pn) these
english: …And you have to keep your body temperature normal. Don't forget these 2 things.
japanese: 下がった体温を回復させること。これらを忘れてはいけないぞ

definitions: 無茶[むちゃ] (adv) absurd, unreasonable, excessive, rash,very, extremely, excessively
english: Don't overdo it.
japanese: むちゃをしてはいけないぞ

definitions: 挑む[いどむ] (v5m, vi) to challenge to (a fight, game, etc.), to throw down the gauntlet, to contend for,to tackle (e.g. a problem), to attempt, to go after (a prize, record, etc.),to pressure (someone) for sex, to make advances to
english: You ever hear about those who challenged the cliff?
japanese: 君たちは絶壁に挑んだ男たちの話を聞いたことがあるかい？

definitions: 山[やま] (n-pref) mountain, hill,mine (e.g. coal mine),heap, pile,crown (of a hat), thread (of a screw), tread (of a tire), protruding part of an object,climax, peak, critical point,guess, speculation,criminal case, crime,mountain climbing, mountaineering,festival float (esp. one mounted with a decorative halberd),wall, wall tile,temple, temple grounds,wild
english: The first time my friend Yamski and I tried to climb the cliff was 30 years ago.
japanese: わたしと友人ヤマスキーが初めて絶壁に挑んだのは３０年前のことだ

definitions: 険しい[けわしい] (adj-i) precipitous, rugged, inaccessible, impregnable, steep,grim, severe, stern
english: 20 Years ago, Yamski and I braved this cliff to see what was on the other side.
japanese: ３０年前、わたしは友人ヤマスキーと絶壁の向こうを見るためにあのけわしいカベに挑んだ

definitions: 壁[かべ] (n) wall, partition,barrier, obstacle,Chinese "Wall" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
english: 20 Years ago, Yamski and I braved this cliff to see what was on the other side.
japanese: ３０年前、わたしは友人ヤマスキーと絶壁の向こうを見るためにあのけわしいカベに挑んだ

definitions: 無知[むち] (n, adj-na) ignorance, innocence, stupidity
english: But, we weren't prepared for it. We never dreamed the temperature would be so low…
japanese: しかし、わたしらは無知すぎた。ある程度の寒さは予想していたが……

definitions: 凄まじい[すさまじい] (adj-i) terrific, fierce, terrible, tremendous, dreadful, awful, amazing, absurd, cutthroat, intense
english: That cliff has a biting cold wind that lowers your body temperature.
japanese: あの絶壁には、すさまじい寒気が嵐のようにうず巻いているんだ。寒気が体温をどんどん奪っていく

definitions: 寒気[さむけ] (n) chill, the shivers, shivering fit,cold, coldness, cold air
english: That cliff has a biting cold wind that lowers your body temperature.
japanese: あの絶壁には、すさまじい寒気が嵐のようにうず巻いているんだ。寒気が体温をどんどん奪っていく

definitions: 嵐[あらし] (n) storm, tempest,storm, hullaballoo, uproar, winds (e.g. of change)
english: That cliff has a biting cold wind that lowers your body temperature.
japanese: あの絶壁には、すさまじい寒気が嵐のようにうず巻いているんだ。寒気が体温をどんどん奪っていく

definitions: 渦巻く[うずまく] (v5k, vi) to whirl, to eddy, to swirl, to curl (smoke),to be all jumbled together (feelings, thoughts, etc.),to surge, to sweep
english: That cliff has a biting cold wind that lowers your body temperature.
japanese: あの絶壁には、すさまじい寒気が嵐のようにうず巻いているんだ。寒気が体温をどんどん奪っていく

definitions: ザイル (n) climbing rope (i.e. for mountaineering)
english: Yamski was below me. He cut his own rope…
japanese: わたしの下を登っていたヤマスキーは自分でザイルを切って……

definitions: 提供[ていきょう] (n, vs) offer, tender, providing, supplying, making available, donating (blood, organs, etc.),sponsoring (a TV program)
english: I've lived here ever since… challenging the cliff and providing warning and shelter to my fellow climbers.
japanese: 以来わたしは、この地に移り絶壁に挑みつづけ、同じ仲間に注意と、ほんの少しの休息を提供しているんだよ

definitions: 棚[たな] (n) shelf, shelves, ledge, rack,trellis
店[たな] (n) merchant's home,rented home,store, shop
タナ (n) Tannat (wine grape variety)
english: Second, warm yourselves up once you get to a ledge.
japanese: ２つめは絶壁の途中のタナに着いたら必ず下がった体温を回復させること

definitions: 弁[べん] (n) speech, tongue, talk, eloquence,dialect, brogue, accent,bento, [object Object],petal,valve,Oversight Department, [object Object]
便[べん] (n) convenience, service, facility, accommodation,excreta (esp. faeces), excrement, stool
冕[べん] (n) crown
english: But, if anyone ever told me to live here, I'd tell them to…well, you know…
japanese: こんなところに住めって言われたらオレは、迷わずカンベンしてくれって答えるぜ……

definitions: 工夫[くふう] (n, vs) scheme, device, scheming, devising, figuring out, coming up with, solving ingeniously,dedication to spiritual improvement (esp. through Zen meditation)
工夫[こうふ] (n) labourer, laborer, blue-collar worker
english: I tell you one thing though, If I did have to live here I'd change things around 'n' make it better.
japanese: でも、もし住むことになったらきっと、いろいろ工夫して居心地よくしようとすると思うんだ

definitions: 居心地[いごこち] (n) comfort
english: I tell you one thing though, If I did have to live here I'd change things around 'n' make it better.
japanese: でも、もし住むことになったらきっと、いろいろ工夫して居心地よくしようとすると思うんだ

definitions: 行き着く[ゆきつく] (v5k, vi) to arrive at, to end up
english: I guess Midgar is the total opposite of this place.
japanese: そんな人間の工夫の行き着いたところが…………ミッドガルなのか

definitions: 吹雪[ふぶき] (n) snow storm, blizzard
english: Gotta keep telling myself this blizzard's okay…brr
japanese: こんな吹雪なんて、へっちゃらよ！そうでも言ってないと……もう……

definitions: 守り[もり] (n) babysitting, babysitter,protecting, keeping, keeper
守り[まもり] (n) protection, defense, defence,providence,amulet, charm, talisman
english: Received "Protection Ring"!
japanese: 『守りの指輪』を手にいれた！

definitions: 行き止まり[いきどまり] (n) dead end, cul-de-sac, blind alley, no through road (i.e. on signage),end, end of the road, end point, as far as one can go
english: Dead end.
japanese: 行き止まりだ

definitions: 烈火[れっか] (n) raging fire, conflagration
english: Received "Fire Armlet"!
japanese: 『烈火の腕輪』を手にいれた！
